background.$description: Table background color. White surface for clean appearance.

border.$description: Table border color for horizontal separators only (panel-border equivalent, neutral.300 for visibility).

background.$description: Table header background color. Light neutral gray for header distinction (alabaster equivalent).

text.$description: Table header text color. Primary text for readability.

background.$description: Table subheader background color. Medium light gray for subheader distinction (pale-gray equivalent).

text.$description: Table subheader text color. Primary text for readability.

default.$description: Default row background color. White for clean appearance.

hover.$description: Row background color on hover. Medium light gray (paint-gray equivalent).

selected.$description: Selected/active row background color. Light accent for highlight (pale-blue equivalent).

text.$description: Cell text color. Primary text for readability.
